Title: Receipt for Yoke Tax
Description: Rectangular fragment of a writing-board made of wood. Demotic inscription: receipt for Yoke Tax. In the text we can find the names Psenamounis and Teos
Bibliographic references: Brunsch 1982-83 / Acht Holztafeln aus dem Britischen Museum, London (no. 2, p. 34-35.)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51860) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51860)
